comments:
I200311192030

- create a new java project with a class MyClass
- close the project
- try to open the file MyClass.java via File -> Open External File...
-> Exception in the log

Funny, but OK:
- delete the project from the workspace but leave it on the file system
-> now, it can be openend as external file
- leave the editor open and re-create the project
-> now, I can open a java editor on MyClass in addition to the external file editor
